verses.name: Jeremiah 48:9
verses.text: Give wings unto Moab, that it may flee and get away: for the cities thereof shall be desolate, without any to dwell therein.

verses.name: Jeremiah 48:10
verses.text: Cursed be he that doeth the work of the Lord deceitfully, and cursed be he that keepeth back his sword from blood.

verses.name: Jeremiah 48:11
verses.text: Moab hath been at ease from his youth, and he hath settled on his lees, and hath not been emptied from vessel to vessel, neither hath he gone into captivity: therefore his taste remained in him, and his scent is not changed.
